LanguageData.TG_CaravanSpecializationsTooltip: Caravans will have a random number of specializations in this interval. Set both values to zero to disable specializations.
LanguageData.TG_OrbitalSpecializationsTooltip: Orbital traders will have a random number of specializations in this interval. Set both values to zero to disable specializations.
LanguageData.TG_IdeologyMayAddStock: Trader ideology may add extra stock
LanguageData.TG_IdeologyMayAddStockTooltip: Some ideologies will add extra stock to the trader that follows them. For example, ideologies approving of charity may have some medicine in stock while ideologies that love insect meat will always purchase it.
LanguageData.TG_IdeologyMayForbidTrading: Trader ideology may forbid trading certain items
LanguageData.TG_IdeologyMayForbidTradingTooltip: When this setting is enabled, certain ideologies will refuse to stock or trade certain items. For example most ideologies will reject purchasing human leather and human meat. Body purists will reject purchasing bionics, and so on. This setting may make certain strategies less profitable and the game slightly more difficult.
LanguageData.TG_IgnoreColonyPopulationCommonality: Ignore colony population when calculating trader commonality
LanguageData.TG_IgnoreColonyPopulationCommonalityTool: In vanilla RimWorld, traders such as the slaver orbital trader become less frequent when the population of the colony increases until they cannot appear at all. If this setting is enabled, trader commonality will no longer depend on the colony population. Enabling this setting will simplify increasing your colony population and therefore will make the game easier.
LanguageData.TG_SellPsylinkNeuroformersTooltip: If this setting is enabled, traders with the psycasting specialization and traders belonging to psy-inclined ideologies may have psylink neuroformers in stock. The Empire refuses to sell psylink neuroformers regardless of this setting.
LanguageData.TG_ResetSettingsTooltip: Reset all options of the mod to their default values.
LanguageData.TG_DevelopmentOptionsTooltip: These options are meant for development and bug reporting, and should not have any in-game effects.
LanguageData.TG_LogTraderGenTooltip: Show a detailed report of the generation process of traders in the log.
LanguageData.TG_LogTraderStockGenTooltip: Include stock generator information when Log trader generation is enabled.
